## ReadableEthersStabilio class

Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableStabilio](./lib-base.readablestabilio.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ReadableEthersStabilio implements ReadableStabilio 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableStabilio](./lib-base.readablestabilio.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ReadableEthersStabilio` class.
